Getting around

Home

Visit O'ahu

Planning

Driving

Renting a car is by far the most popular option that travelers choose. The speed limits in Oahu are lower than in the mainland (U.S). There is plenty to do in the surrounding towns near Honululu. Cars can be rented from the airport or you may inquire for 4x4 or jeep rentals. Be mindful that some services requre the driver to be at least 25 years of age

Public Transportation

The Bus is a local public transportation system that services Honolulu and Waikiki but it does have routes extending to almost every major town on the island. To catch a ride on The Bus find a bus stop sign and wait for the Bus or you can track the bus via app. Once you are on the bus you will need to pull the cord to request your stop.
